title: What the fuck did you just fucking say about me, you little Wardens?
body: I’ll have you know I graduated top of my class in the Shitposters, and I’ve been involved in numerous secret raids on Ezreal Wright and I have over 300 confirmed bans. I am trained in essay writing and I’m the top reporter in the entire Riot boards community. You are nothing to me but just another target. I will wipe you the fuck out with precision the likes of which has never been seen before on this Earth, mark my fucking words. You think you can get away with posting in this thread? Think again, Warden. As we speak I am contacting my secret network of spies across the boards and your IP is being traced right now so you better prepare for the storm, pancake. The storm that wipes out the pathetic little thing you call your account. You’re fucking banned, kid. I can be anywhere, anytime, and I can ban you in over seven hundred ways, and that’s just with my bare hands. Not only am I extensively trained in reporting, but I have access to the entire arsenal of the Riot Memes Corps and I will use it to its full extent to wipe your miserable account off the face of the internet, you little apple girl. If only you could have known what unholy retribution your little “clever” comments was about to bring down upon you, maybe you would have held your fucking tongue. But you couldn’t, you didn’t, and now you’re paying the price, you goddamn pancake. I will shit fury all over you and you will drown in it. You’re fucking banned, Puff hater.
